headline: Tell HN: Apple's Twitter account reached 8M followers without a single tweet
description:
The title already says it.. with an exception of a June 6th, tweet (linking to an apple.com page) about "The new MacBook Air. Supercharged by M2"

@Apple has just reached Eighth million followers without tweeting a single tweet in more than ten years since its account creation, which is bizarre to me.

What I found more bizarre is the people, or accounts in general [I hope you are not one of them :-) ] who chose to "Follow @Apple" even if they are sure it is not tweeting.

Just some weird thoughts that come to my mind in recent days!

[peace]
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：苹果公司的Twitter账户在没有一条推文的情况下达到了800万粉丝
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：蘋果公司的Twitter賬戶在沒有一條推文的情況下達到了800萬粉絲
description_zh-Hans:
标题已经说了......除了6月6日的一条推特（链接到apple.com页面），关于"新MacBook Air。

@Apple刚刚达到第八个百万粉丝，在其账户创建以来的十多年里没有发过一条推文，这对我来说很奇怪。

我发现更奇怪的是那些选择"关注@Apple"的人，或者一般的账户[我希望你不是其中之一：-）]，即使他们确信它没有发推文。

只是我最近几天想到的一些奇怪想法！

[和平］
